GH One TV o bụ ihe ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn ntụrụndụ nke dị na Ghana, nke ọdịnaya ya gụnyere ụdị ndụ, egwu, ejiji, usoro, mmemme ụmụaka, ihe ọchị, na njem nleta

Ọ bụ ugbu a ka Excellence In Broadcasting (EIB) Networks, nke nwere onye mgbasa ozi Bola Ray, dị ka onye isi ya. Ọ bụ Charter House Productions nwebu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
Dabere na nyocha nke GeoPoll mere, GH One bụ ụlọ ọrụ TV nke ise a na-elekarị anya na Ghana
Nana Aba Anamoah bụ onye isi njikwa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ugbu a
